dialogue.text: that was so fun let's keep go-
wait a minute you're the daughter of that no good rockstar daddy dearest who ruined my career and burned my old house down
see I told you that this wasn't a good idea
I HEARD THAT YOU GET ONE CHANCE TO LEAVE GF OR ELSE I WILL HAVE TO CALL MY FRIEND AND I DON'T WANT TO DO THAT
Hey don't talk to my girlfriend like that you big air head
